description:
Now that the club has disbanded, they’ll continue to drift even further apart — but before they do, Yui has one final wish to make.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Les sentiments passent par la chaleur perçue.
Omoi wa, Fureta Netsu dake ga Tashika ni Tsutaete Iru.
Only a Heated Touch Truly Conveys the Sentiment.
وحدها اللمسة الدافئة كفيلة بإيصال المشاعر الصادقة.
想いは, 触れた熱だけが確かに伝えている.
